    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_79444</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_79444</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Blood clot prevention</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blutgerinselverhinderung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Empêchement de caillot de sang</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Prevenção do clot de sangue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Prevenzione del grumo di anima</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόληψη θρόμβων αίματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Prevención del coágulo de sangre</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates two exercises that can be performed inside an aeroplane to prevent the formation of blood clots in the leg veins during long flights.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">blood clots</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">leg muscles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Muscles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">preventive exercises</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt zwei Übungen, die 
innerhalb eines Flugzeugs durchgeführt werden können, um die 
Anordnung der Blutgerinsel in den Beinadern während der langen Flüge
zu verhindern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre deux exercices qui 
peuvent être exécutés à l'intérieur d'un avion pour empêcher la 
formation des caillots de sang dans les veines de jambe pendant de 
longs vols.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra dois exercícios que 
podem ser executados dentro de um avião para impedir a formação de 
clots de sangue nas veias do pé durante vôos longos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra due esercitazioni 
che possono essere effettuate all'interno di un aeroplano per impedire
la formazione dei grumi di anima nelle vene del piedino durante i voli
lunghi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει δύο ασκήσεις που 
μπορούν να εκτελεσθούν μέσα σε ένα αεροπλάνο για να αποτρέψουν 
το σχηματισμό των θρόμβων αίματος στις φλέβες ποδιών κατά τη 
διάρκεια των μακροχρόνιων πτήσεων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra dos ejercicios que se
puedan realizar dentro de un avión para prevenir la formación de los
coágulos de sangre en las venas de la pierna durante vuelos largos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blutgerinsel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beinmuskeln</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Muskeln</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">vorbeugende Übungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">caillots de sang</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">muscles de jambe</string>
          </keyword>
